note.p: Birth: Thorington Hall, Suffolk, England (31 December 1813)
Death: His house in Brook Street, Grosvenor Square, London (20 April 1873)
Career: Physician, St George's Hospital, London (by 1846)
Authority: Birth date from Boase, birth place from DNB
References: N G Coley, 'Henry Bence-Jones, MD, FRS (1813-1873)' in NR 1973-4 vol 28 pp 31-56, plate
Notes: DNB gives year of birth as 1814
